data.message: I want to thank u for Facebook you connected the world. I love u guys!!!

replies.message: Hi there. Thanks so much for the sweet words! We're very happy to have you in our community. :) -Azaria

Facebook - I just wanted to say, I'm old (76), and when I was a kid all we had for communication was the newspaper, radio, mail, and an operator mediated telephone. Now thanks to internet and Facebook I have the world virtually instantly! Fantastic job, keep it up!
Well, if you want to have VR goggles on everyone, everywhere, you can't rely on the phone companies or you home wifi.
Lovin It! Let's make the world a better plan. Disrupt Poverty, Greed and War with Love, Compassion and Generosity!

Don't think they are doing this so others benefit. Yes they will but at what cost? This will allow them to keep tabs on the world. Literally. I'd trade all this technology in for some old fashioned freedom any day of the week.
Michael Scattergood what else is in it for them is another question.. Keeping tabs on others...
